DEBTOR_GROUP.HELP_TXT_1: This interface allows you to review, find, and configure debtor groups
DEBTOR_GROUP.HELP_TXT_3: Lock the selected debtor group.  No new transactions can be recorded for a locked group

SUBSIDIES.TITLE: Subsidies
SUBSIDIES.INFO: With this configuration unchecked no member of this debtor group will qualify for any subsidies
SUBSIDIES.LABEL: This group qualifies for subsidies
SUBSIDIES.EMPTY: This debtor group is not subscribed to any subsidies

DISCOUNTS.TITLE: Discounts
DISCOUNTS.INFO: With this configuration unchecked no member of this debtor group will qualify for any discounts
DISCOUNTS.LABEL: This group qualifies for discounts

BILLING_SERVICES.TITLE: Billing Services
BILLING_SERVICES.INFO: With this configuration option checked all members of this debtor group will be exempt from paying automatically applied billing services
BILLING_SERVICES.LABEL: This group is exempt from paying billing services
BILLING_SERVICES.EMPTY: This debtor group is not subscribed to any billing services

DEBTOR_GROUP.TITLE: Debtor Group Management
